ACAlarmExtender.Execute (METH)
ACAlarmExtender.Execute (METH)
Â¶
METHOD Execute
Executes the action. This function is part of the AlarmManager.IAlarmNotifiable interface.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Input
eCurrTransition
AlarmStateTransition
The currently processed alarm state transition. This will be
evaluated in order to determine, whether the action has to be
executed or not.
itfAlarm
IAlarm
The alarm, for which the action has to be performed
pbyAdditionalData
POINTER TO BYTE
An optional pointer to a structure variable containing
additional parameter
